urls.title: Senior Health Professional launches National Gardening Therapy initiative helping thousands through lockdown - POP Gardens
urls.description: ‚ÄúFew things can lift the spirits as easily as gardening, except perhaps allowing your creativity to flow. This innovative activity box from horticultural specialist POP Gardens lets you do both by harnessing the therapeutic powers of gardening and art‚Äù ‚Äì Gardens Illustrated Magazine Since lockdown commenced and having to cancel all her therapeutic courses, Senior Occupational Therapist Lynne Evans has ... Read More

text: @EnvAgency Hello, just wanted to send you this innovative horticultural therapy initiative by POP Gardens helping people across the UK through the pandemic. Wondered if you would be interested? Many thanks, https://t.co/MxuiDkDT1u

urls.title: Flood and Coastal Engineering | Brunel University London
urls.description: This exciting new funded programme, developed in partnership with the Environment Agency will equip you with the knowledge you need for a successful career in flood risk management.

text:
Take your knowledge further with a Flood and Coastal Engineering MSc. 

Scholarships are available, full time for one year starting in September 2021 and will include a 3 month work placement at the @EnvAgency (subject to terms and conditions).

Apply now: https://t.co/qatD7dFz4V https://t.co/KoUtT6MRnk
